Account Clerk Job at Shelter Setters




        
    

        
        Shelter Setters is a leading aluminum production company based in Ilorin, Nigeria, dedicated to delivering high-quality, durable, and innovative aluminum solutions for residential, commercial, and industrial projects. Since our founding, we have built a strong reputation for excellence in craftsmanship, customer satisfaction, and reliability.

We are committed to setting the standard for quality and innovation in the aluminum sector, contributing to the growth of infrastructure and housing in Ilorin and beyond. Whether for small-scale builds or large-scale developments, Shelter Setters is your trusted partner for precision, performance, and long-lasting value.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Clerk
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Location: Ilorin, Kwara 
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Account reconciliation: Reconciling bank statements and other financial records to ensure accuracy and identify discrepancies.
	Reporting: Assisting in the preparation of financial reports, such as income statements and balance sheets.
	Administrative support: Performing general administrative tasks like sorting mail and responding to vendor or client inquiries.
	Record keeping: Posting financial transactions, organizing financial documents, and maintaining accounting databases.
	Transaction processing: Processing invoices, managing accounts payable and receivable, and handling payments and deposits.


Required Skills


	Attention to detail and strong organizational skills.
	Proficiency with accounting software and general computer skills.
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills to interact with internal and external stakeholders.
	Basic understanding of accounting principles and financial record-keeping.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and cover letter to: info.ssaeltd@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
